attributes.action: Government to give free bus passes for all  children to & from school in  UK
attributes.additional_details:
Every driver on the road is struggling with traffic congestion, safety concerns, and rising travel costs — many school buses and public transport services run half empty. It’s time for a practicality! 
* Less traffic
*  Cleaner air: less pollution.
* Every child deserves a safe and reliable trip to school.
*  Buses already running, Using these resources efficiently costs little or nothing extra.
* park & rides drop-off solutions already exist,
attributes.background:
Make free bus travel to and from school available for all school children
Our cities and towns are facing daily gridlock during school run hours.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Free bus travel for under 16s: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/740392
